short_summary: We need 10 junior human resources consultants for one year with the option of two additional years.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title
Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) for Compensation Consultant, Junior

#### Reference Number
W6369-23-A080

#### Publication Date
2023-05-04

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-05-31T14:00:00

#### Amendment Number
2

#### Expected Contract Start and End Dates
2023-06-01 to 2024-06-01

#### Notice Information
* Notice type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade agreements: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement

#### Contract Information
* Contract authority: Natalie Provost
* E-mail: Natalie.Provost@forces.gc.ca

#### Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement
The Department of National Defence (DND) through the Director Human Resources Business Management (DHRBM) and the Director Military Pay and Allowances Processing (DMPAP) has a requirement for ten (10) Compensation Consultants to provide compensation services to support the Sea Duty Allowance (SDA)/Sub-Marine Allowance (SUBA) and Hardship (HA)/Hardship Bonus (HAB) Allowance Project. The consultants will work on the following categories:

*    Human Resources Services Stream: 1.5 Compensations Consultant, Junior

Security requirements:
*       Company minimum security level required: hold a valid designated organization screening (DOS)
*       Resource minimum security level required: each resource must hold a valid Reliability Status clearance

Estimated level of effort: 240 days per resource. The proposed period of contract shall be from the Contract Award to one (1) year later, with up to two (2) additional one-year option periods.

### Contact Information
*   Natalie Provost
*   natalie.provost@forces.gc.ca
